entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Guysborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:07 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 10:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: NNE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to freezing rain this evening then to snow after midnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 9 except minus 13 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9 except minus 13 inland. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
